price: Bantu! Nimufungure rero mu vyiza bimera kw’isi, muheze muragire n’ibitungwa vyanyu ahari ubwatsi. Mu vy’ukuri muri ivyo vyose rero, ni ukuri harimwo ivyemezo vyotuma abanyabwenge babushitse[3], batahura ubushobozi n'ububasha vy’Imana Allah, bakayisenga ari Imwe Rudende.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ
footnotes: [3] Abanyabwenge babushitse, ni abantu bafise ubwenge ndemanwa butuma barangwa n’ingeso nziza bagakora n’ivyiza.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
